SEAFOOD WARNING: *If you have an allergy to seafood, you should not eat any of the foods prepared in this restaurant. We cannot guarantee that our food will be free from all traces of seafood.

ADVISORY: Before placing your order please inform your server if anyone in your party has any food allergies. *The consumption of raw or undercooked foods such as meat, poultry, fish, shellfish, or eggs which may contain harmful bacteria, may cause serious illness. 18 years & under: Steak must be cooked to 155oF or more in the middle.

"We take pride in every dish we put out and are devoted to delivering the best dining experience possible to each of our diners."

HOURS
4 pm - 9 pm Reservations (at least One Hour in Advance) 
APPETIZERS

Steamed to order and tossed in salt - $6.00

Fresh yellow tail jaw seasoned with just simply salt and baked to perfection - $13.00

COMBINATIONS

All combinations are served with a choice of two sides: Miso soup • Clear soup • House salad (Ginger or Ranch) • Steamed rice

[Page Title: Hachiya Kyoto – Steakhouse & Sushi Bar – Charleston – Hachiya Kyoto Steakhouse and Sushi Bar – Traditional Japanese hibachi style cooking in the low country]

Skip to content STEAKHOUSE & SUSHI BAR 
Sharing traditional Japanese hibachi-style cooking

with the low country for over 30 years.
*Limited Capacity - Reservations Highly Recommended *No outside food or drinks permitted* 
Charleston
OPEN 
Tuesday - Sunday 4-9PM

Curbside Pickup, Dine-In
ORDER ONLINE Our Story 
We opened our family-owned restaurant with the intention of sharing traditional Japanese hibachi-style cooking with the low country and it was one of the first of its kind.
Learn More 
Over our 30 years in business we have changed our name, moved and expanded but
our dedication to traditional cooking techniques and serving the freshest ingredients available has remained the same. Our Story 1988 
Kyoto Japanese Steakhouse
1998 
Miyabi Kyoto Japanese Steakhouse
2019 
Hachiya Kyoto Japanese Steakhouse
HIBACHI 
Our main dining room features state of the art smokeless hibachi tables each accommodating parties as large as ten.
View Menu SUSHI 
Our seafood is sourced from suppliers who purchase directly from the highest quality of sashimi-grade seafood.
View Menu Our Hours 
Tuesday - Sunday: 4 pm - 9 pm

Curbside Pickup, Dine-In

Tues-Sun: 4 pm to 5 pm
Early Bird Hours *Dine In Only 
*Everyone needs to be seated before the early bird end time to qualify*

*Limited Capacity - Reservations Highly Recommended*

Reservations (at least One Hour in Advance)
